calendar.description: House Public Utilities and Energy Hearing
Senate Transportation, Public Utilities, Energy, and Technology Hearing

general_provisions: This bill creates the Nuclear Energy Consortium and the Utah Energy Council, establishes a process for designating energy development zones, and creates the Energy Development Investment Fund.
hilighted_provisions: This bill:<hr><ltbullet>defines terms;<hr><ltbullet>creates the Nuclear Energy Consortium within the Office of Energy Development (office) and establishes its membership and duties;<hr><ltbullet>creates the Utah Energy Council within the office and establishes its membership and duties;<hr><ltbullet>modifies the duties and name of the Utah San Rafael Energy Lab Board;<hr><ltbullet>establishes a process for designating electrical energy development zones;<hr><ltbullet>creates the Electrical Energy Development Investment Fund and provides for its administration;<hr><ltbullet>establishes authorized uses of fund money; and<hr><ltbullet>includes a coordination clause to coordinate between this bill and H.B. 70, Decommissioned Asset Disposition Amendments.
